title: Police Sergeant who joined Galle Face Green protest interdicted
body_lines: The Police Sergeant who joined the public protest at Galle Face Green, over the ongoing crisis, has been interdicted, Police said.
The Police sergeant attached to the Kuttigala Police Station had joined the public protest presently ongoing at the Galle Face agitation site on April 14 while being assigned for special duties.
He was later arrested by the police and granted bail by the Fort Magistrate's Court.
Police said the sergeant was interdicted from the service with effect from April 14.
Earlier, Police said that disciplinary action will be taken against him following an investigation. (Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
